data.text: My Best stay ever in Dubai for 6years. I have always loved this hotel cause of cleanliness, customer care of staff, convinience. I feel at home cause I always come with my sister and staff they love it more. All staff at J5 welcome me happily
data.title: Excellent

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Tripadvisor Member,
Thank you for your kind comments. We are pleased to know that you had a wonderful stay and rated us your best stay ever in Dubai!
It gives us great pleasure to know that the cleanliness, customer service, staff, and convenient location were the reasons that you keep on coming back to the hotel. 
Our goal is to make all of our valued guests feel at home and well taken care of and it gives us great pleasure to know that the team served you well.
It was our pleasure to have you as our guest and we would be glad to see you again soon.
Warm regards,
J5 Rimal Hotel Apartment Team
owner_response.author: EO Rimal

data.text:
I normally stay in the J5 Rimal during an exhibition. I know this hotel for 9 years and most of the time when I am in Dubai I take it. The J5 Rimal has spacious rooms where you will find comfortable beds equipped with a convenient kitchenette. Bathroom is also big as well as the closet. The house keeping is done very detailed and with lots of care.

I always have room with breakfast included as I enjoy the good buffet service as well as great quality coffee. The buffet contains of European style food as well as Arabian dishes, great selection. The staff knows my habits which makes it even more pleasant when having breaktfast. Staff is absolutely adorable.

The staff of the J5 Rimal is very nice, very helpful and competent. I know some people for many years, which makes it like coming home. The reception is open 24/7 and this is great. 

I always and happily return to the J5 Rimal. Whoever reads this should understand that there is a good reason for me to call the J5 Rimal my second home. Great rooms, great location in a lively area and wonderful and truly qualified staff.
data.title: Great hotel in a lively area

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Tripadvisor Member,
Thank you for making J5 Rimal your second home and for the inspiring and wonderful review about your recent stay with us. 
Reviews such as these are a constant reminder of our staff's dedication to delighting and creating memorable experiences for all of our guests, and that our team was able to create an amazing impression on you during your stay. It's something our staff takes great pride in.
Your positive feedback about our breakfast will surely be shared with our Chef and his team to serve as an inspiration.
Our rooms are indeed favorable to our guests who value space and comforts and it has a kitchenette to make it more convenient for guests who stay with us for a long time.
We are also delighted that being at the best location provided you with the convenience we intended, such as ease of access to shopping and a short walk to the metro station which are very convenient for our guests. 
Again, our appreciation to you for your generous review. We hope to see- you again soon for another fantastic time.  
Warm regards,

J5 Rimal Hotel Apartment
owner_response.author: EO Rimal

data.text:

data.title: Bad stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Tripadvisor Member, 
We are writing to express our sincere apologies for the inconvenience you experienced during your recent stay at our hotel. Your feedback is of great value to us, and we are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We take your comments seriously and will be discussing them with the relevant department to ensure that we address the issues you have raised. 
Regarding the feedback you provided about our prices, we want to assure you that we believe our pricing represents good value for money. Please note that all hotels use dynamic pricing, where room rates are based on factors such as occupancy levels and seasons. We recommend booking your stay in advance to take advantage of the best rates available. 
We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to J5 Rimal Hotel Apartments in the future and to make your stay a more pleasant one. 
Sincerely,
J5 Rimal Hotel Apartments
owner_response.author: EO Rimal

data.text:
This review is on the restaurant and breakfast service from J5. I booked my room work breakfast and had the pleasure to enjoy the very kind and outstanding service from Manal, a lady from Syria and Vimlendu a gentleman from India. The food was delicious, nicely displaced as Buffet Service. 
I was enjoying my breakfast for 10 days. But what really made the difference is the treatment you get from the staff, such as Manal and Vimlendu. They always remembered my preferences on the coffee (double shot cappuccino) and the freshly prepared omelet. Thank you Manal and thank you Vimlendu for taking are of me so nicely. It has been a great experience. It is always a pleasure to return and enjoy your warm and polite hospitality. Thank you ever so much. Kindest regards 
René
data.title: Warm and polite hospitality.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear TripAdvisor Member,

Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review. We greatly appreciate your acknowledgment of our dedication to providing exceptional service to our valued guests. Our top priority is to ensure that our guests enjoy a memorable and comfortable stay, and it brings us great joy to hear that we have succeeded in doing so.

We take pride in our staff's commitment to delivering warm and genuine service, and we are grateful that you appreciated their efforts. We are especially glad to hear that they remembered your coffee preferences and served fresh omelets daily. We will be sure to share your heartfelt compliments with Manal and Vimblendu, who have both demonstrated their dedication to providing excellent service.

We look forward to welcoming you back soon, and if there is anything we can do to assist you before your next visit, please do not hesitate to let us know.

Warm regards,

J5 Rimal Hotel Apartments
owner_response.author: EO Rimal

data.text:
I was extremely impressed by the care given to me and my friends by the J5 Rimal staff. They were attentive to us and always ready to deliver any needs to our room within 5 minutes. They were so helpful and the check-in and check-out process was very smooth.

My personal highlight: we had breakfast in the mornings and one of the waiters, Kavindu, served my wife and myself with so much care. He always had our orders in mind, remembered what we like, and was always making coffee for us perfectly! He would start conversation and make us feel welcomed each day, starting out our day feeling blessed by his hospitality.

To the J5 Rimal staff, thank you.
To Kavindu especially, thank YOU! I hope you read this one day!
data.title: Impressed by the hospitality of the hotel staff. Special thanks to Kavindu for making us feel welcomed every morning.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Tripadvisor Member,

Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful review with us. 

We are delighted that your stay had been excellent and that our hospitality exceeded your expectations. We at J5 take pride in our staff and the hospitality and service they extend to our guests and reading your kind words brings us great joy and inspiration.

We are also grateful for your acknowledgment of the hospitality and great service of Kavindu, I’m confident this will be a great motivation for him.

It has been a great pleasure hosting you; we can’t wait to see you again!

Warm regards,

J5 Rimal Hotel Apartment
owner_response.author: EO Rimal
